resources.string: Do you wanna create a new game or load an old one?
Othello is played on an 8 x 8 board with 64 discs, black on 1 side and white on the other
Place 4 discs in the center of the board, 2 with the black side up and 2 with the white side up.
lack places a disc so that it and 1 of his starting discs flank a white disc (i.e. a white disc will be between two black discs).
Black flips the (flanked) white disc over so it is now black, and belongs to the Black player.
